thread.title: Accume Partners Welcomes Sanjay Bobby Marwaha as Managing Director, US Risk and Regulatory Advisory Practice Leader

author: cnbc.com
title: Accume Partners Welcomes Sanjay Bobby Marwaha as Managing Director, US Risk and Regulatory Advisory Practice Leader

organizations.name: us risk and regulatory advisory practice

text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Accume Partners announced today that it has hired Sanjay Bobby Marwaha as the firm’s US Risk and Regulatory Advisory Practice Leader.
“Marwaha was selected due to his broad risk, regulatory, and technical expertise coupled with his strong background of leading and managing teams, engagements and client relationships, which will set the standards at Accume and help maintain the firm’s leadership position as a trusted advisory firm for years to come,” said David Roath, CEO of Accume Partners.
Prior to joining Accume, Marwaha most recently was at BDO where he grew and was the Leader of the Risk Advisory Financial Services Practice, member of the National Banking Executive Committee, Co-Leader of the National Banking Business Development Committee, and Blockchain Co-Leader. In addition, he was at PricewaterhouseCoopers where he rose through the ranks to become the Chief of Staff and a leader in the Governance, Risk and Compliance Practice along with a member of the Diamond Leadership Team. He also previously worked for JPMorgan Chase and General Motors Asset Management.
Marwaha brings a collaborative and results oriented leadership style to Accume as well as his strong background in internal audit, regulatory compliance, enterprise risk management, business process management, information technology, blockchain, and program management. Over his career, he worked with a broad variety of clients ranging from large and small financial institutions, including: banking and capital markets, asset management (family office, hedge funds, and private equity), insurance companies, FinTech, exchanges, and other non-financial services sector clients within retail and consumer, technology, industrial products, health care, pharmaceutical, entertainment, media, and communications, higher education, private company services, and non-profits.
He is highly successful at working closely with Board Members, Audit Committees, C-suite, and senior executives. He will guide a Practice of Risk and Regulatory experts who are currently serving over 500 clients across 40 states.
Commenting on his new role, Marwaha said, “I am looking forward to guiding the strategic growth of Accume Partners by leveraging my experience in building practices that have proven successful over my career from the ground up at two of the largest top five service firms in the world.”
About Accume Partners
Since 1994, Accume Partners has been providing internal audit, regulatory compliance, enterprise risk management, business process management, program management, cyber-security, and IT risk services to organizations. Through these key areas of focus, Accume is able to remain at the forefront of changing needs and regulations of its clients, bring balanced perspectives and the specialized knowledge necessary to serve today’s institutions.
